bibl.bibl: Hooker, Joseph Dalton. 1846c. On the vegetation of the Galapagos Archipelago, as compared with that of some other tropical islands and of the continent of America. [Read 1 and 15 December 1846.] Proceedings of the Linnean Society of London 1 (1849): 312, 313, 314; Transactions of the Linnean Society of London 20 (1851): 235-62.
